.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkWriteDescriptorSet-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_WRITE_DESCRIPTOR_SET
* [[VUID-VkWriteDescriptorSet-pNext-pNext]] pname:pNext must: be `NULL`
* [[VUID-VkWriteDescriptorSet-descriptorType-parameter]] pname:descriptorType must: be a valid elink:VkDescriptorType value
* [[VUID-VkWriteDescriptorSet-descriptorCount-arraylength]] pname:descriptorCount must: be greater than `0`
* [[VUID-VkWriteDescriptorSet-commonparent]] Both of pname:dstSet, and the elements of pname:pTexelBufferView that are valid handles must: have been created, allocated, or retrieved from the same sname:VkDevice
****
